dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy
J. Liu
T.-T. Ng
G. Wang
dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis that includes videos in RGB, depth-maps, 3D-skeletons, and infrared. It contains 56880 samples with one or more subjects performing a particular action, recorded using three simultaneous Microsoft Kinect II sensors.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D
